Test.Name: GetServices and Digest suported
Test.Description: GetServices - supported. Digest - supported.

Test.Name: Correct response - all commands have Anonymous level
Test.Description: Check Default access policy - Anonymous test when DUT sends correct response !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! First of all press 'Check' on the Discovery tab to set initial authentification level !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
